author: barnabasbusa
content: After ACDT call, we discussed that we gonna trigger an unfinality asap on fusaka-devnet-3. Expect some issues in the next couple days.

author: bharath.vedartham
content: yo <@&688101493978562687> we have setup a new mev relay: http://mev-relay-1-arm.fusaka-devnet-3.ethpandaops.io:9060/ please do update caplin to include it

author: jimmygchen
content: This one currently is an artificial one right?

author: barnabasbusa
content: Yes. We aim to recover the chain in approx 2d

author: barnabasbusa
content: till then we will have a split chain

author: mininny
content:
Hi everyone, here's a quick report on the chaos testing/network split tests that we've been working with in the last few weeks. https://testinprod.notion.site/Sunnyside-Devnet-Report-Sep-8-2648fc57f54680fdb080f2a1714e48d8
With this, we're planning to run more diverse chaos testing in our devnets. We're also planning to run similar test in devnet-3 once current unfinality testing is finished(& before we tear down devnet-3). 
As we perform more tests and gather more metrics, please let us know if you guys have any testing ideas or data that you'd like to know üôè
